visuals.title: Energy Signal - Rectangular Pulse
visuals.description: A pulse has finite area (energy) and decays to zero. Total energy E = ∫|x(t)|² dt is finite.

visuals.title: Power Signal - Sinusoid
visuals.description: A sinusoid extends forever, having infinite energy but finite average power P = lim (1/2T) ∫|x(t)|² dt.

visuals.title: Power Dissipation in Resistor
visuals.description: Power dissipation P = VI. The operating point Q on the v-i curve determines the power flow.

visuals.title: Unit Step Function
visuals.description: Neither energy nor power signal: step function u(t) has both infinite energy and infinite average power.
